name: IpSmartPtr
brief:
Intrusive reference-counting smart pointer for Ipopt

Provides SmartPtr<T> template class implementing automatic memory
management via reference counting. All managed objects must inherit
from ReferencedObject. Used throughout Ipopt for safe object lifetime
management without manual delete calls.

Key design: intrusive (count stored in object) vs non-intrusive
(count stored externally). Intrusive chosen to avoid double-counting
when raw pointers are passed between SmartPtr instances.

@note Does NOT handle circular references - use weak pointers or
explicit release methods for bidirectional object graphs.
see: IpObserver.hpp for observer pattern using SmartPtr
